alert.note: Alert for Independence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 4:30PM CDT until August 26 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Independence County in north central Arkansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moorefield, or 8 miles east of Batesville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newark... Magness... Moorefield... Salado... Sulphur Rock... Charlotte... Rosie... Gainesboro... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
